error.title: Error!
error.400_e: Invalid input detected. Please check your input.
error.429_e: The server is receiving too many requests. Please try again later.
error.500_e: The server stopped working due to an unexpected error.

login.title: Login
login.login_kkutu: Please login to play KKuTu N.

loginfail.title: Login Failed
loginfail.description: Failed to login. Please try again.

kkutu.title: Rule the words! KKuTu Online
kkutu.meta_desc: Online Word Chain, Shiritori, Initial Quiz, Crossword, Typing Battle! Be the master of vocabulary in KKuTu.
kkutu.websocketUnsupport:
This game supports Internet Explorer (10+), Chrome (16+), Firefox (11+), Opera (12.1+), Safari (6+)!
Please update your browser.
kkutu.dictionarySupport: Dictionary Data Provided by: Standard Korean Language Dictionary, WordNet
kkutu.welcomeTestServer: You have connected to the Test Server. This server may explode or close without special notice.
kkutu.error_full: Server is full... Please try again later!!!
kkutu.error_401:
Guest accounts can only spectate games.
Please login via the button on the top right!
kkutu.error_402:
Guest accounts can only connect to the Apple server.
Please login via the button on the top right!
kkutu.error_404: No available rooms found. Create a new room?
kkutu.error_406: Cannot rejoin a room you were kicked from.
kkutu.error_408: Connection terminated because you logged in from another location.
kkutu.error_410: You have been banned from the game by an administrator.
kkutu.error_411:
You cannot start the game alone.
To play alone, click [Practice] or use [Invite] > [AI Invite].
kkutu.error_413: You must select at least one topic.
kkutu.error_414: Inappropriate topic detected. Please re-select the topic.
kkutu.error_415: Bot cannot participate in this game mode.
kkutu.error_416:
The game has already started.
Would you like to enter as a spectator?
kkutu.error_417: Account does not exist in the lobby.
kkutu.error_419: User has already received an invitation.
kkutu.error_421:
Profile management requires login.
Please login via the button on the top right!
kkutu.error_423:
Shop requires login.
Please login via the button on the top right!
kkutu.error_424:
The user is not connected to KKuTu or this server. (Please remove spaces from the name.)

User:
kkutu.error_428: Observers automatically leave the room when the game ends.
kkutu.error_432: Invalid room configuration. Please reset the number of players.
kkutu.error_433: Invalid room configuration. Please reset the number of rounds.
kkutu.error_435: You can combine up to 6 word pieces at a time.
kkutu.error_436: You can only combine words listed in the dictionary.
kkutu.error_437: You were kicked from the room for skipping 3 consecutive turns.
kkutu.error_440: Guests, unverified members, and users under 16 are restricted from playing between 0:00 AM and 6:00 AM.
kkutu.error_441: Unable to read your birthdate information. Please check if your birthdate is set to public on your login account and try again. You can hide it again after verification.
kkutu.error_442: Disconnected due to no response for over 5 minutes.
kkutu.error_444:
Game access restricted by administrator.
Reason:
kkutu.error_445: Verification successful. Thank you for using KKuTu.
kkutu.error_446:
Game access restricted for this IP address by administrator.
Reason:
kkutu.error_450: The user is not connected to KKuTu or this server.
kkutu.error_451:
Community features require login.
Please login via the button on the top right!
kkutu.error_453: Cannot add guest accounts as friends.
kkutu.error_454: Waiting for response to friend request.
kkutu.error_455: Can only remove friends who are not online.
kkutu.error_457: You have changed your nickname recently. You can change it again after the cooldown set by the server owner.
kkutu.error_470: The room was deleted due to inactivity for 5 minutes.
kkutu.error_471: Room closed due to no active players.
kkutu.error_500: Server maintenance or update in progress.
kkutu.turnError_402: No Killer Word on First Turn
kkutu.checkAgeAsk:
KKuTu requires birthdate for verification. It is used only for verification and internal processing and is not disclosed to third parties.
Proceed with verification?
kkutu.checkAgeInput1: Please enter the year of birth. (4 digits)
kkutu.checkAgeInput2: Please enter the month of birth. (1-12)
kkutu.checkAgeInput3: Please enter the day of birth. (1-31)
kkutu.checkAgeSure: Is the birthdate below correct? It is used only for verification and internal processing and is not disclosed to third parties.
kkutu.checkAgeCancel: Cancel verification and do it later?
kkutu.sureHandover: Are you sure you want to pass the host?
kkutu.linkWarning: You clicked a link. We are not responsible for any damages caused by visiting the link. Continue?
kkutu.trollWarning: You missed two consecutive turns. If you miss the third, you will be kicked from the room.
kkutu.modex0:
Chain English words starting with the last 2-3 letters.
apple → please → secret
kkutu.modex1:
Chain English words starting with the last letter.
apple → elephant → time
kkutu.modex2:
Chain 3-letter Korean words starting with the last letter.
강아지 → 지렁이 → 이발소
kkutu.modex3:
Chain Korean words starting with the last letter.
그물 → 물레방아 → 아저씨
kkutu.modex4: Guess the word using the given topic and initials.
kkutu.modex5: Guess the Korean words to fit into the crossword grid.
kkutu.modex6: Type the given Korean words as fast as possible.
kkutu.modex7: Type the given English words as fast as possible.
kkutu.modex8:
Chain Korean words ending with the first letter.
고구마 → 이실직고 → 맏이
kkutu.modex9:
Chain English words ending with the first letter.
time → elephant → apple
kkutu.modex10: Name a Korean word matching the given initials.
kkutu.modex11: Name a Korean word matching the given topic.
kkutu.modex12: Name an English word matching the given topic.
kkutu.modex13: Find Korean words hidden in the scrambled letters.
kkutu.modex14: Find English words hidden in the scrambled letters.
kkutu.modex15: One player draws, others guess the answer.
kkutu.modex16: Guess the original word from the scrambled letters.
kkutu.modex20: One player draws, others guess the answer.
kkutu.modex21:
Chain 3-letter Korean words ending with the first letter.
이발소 → 지렁이 → 강아지
kkutu.modex22:
Chain 5-letter English words ending with the first letter.
night → lemon → apple
kkutu.pqYouAreDrawer: You are the Drawer! Please draw.
kkutu.subJamsu: All players are ready. If the game doesn't start within 30 seconds, you will automatically leave the room.
kkutu.subJamsu2: All players ready. Converting to spectator if not started in 5 seconds.
kkutu.subJamsu4: In 5 seconds, the game will start automatically and you will join the main game.
kkutu.guestJamsu: The game will start automatically in 5 seconds if you don't cancel ready.
kkutu.masterJamsu: You were kicked because the game didn't start even though all players were ready.
kkutu.masterJamsu2: Converted to spectator for not starting the game.
kkutu.hasKicked: You have been kicked from the room.
kkutu.inputChat: Type in the chat box below.
kkutu.explManner: Prevents the use of killer words.
kkutu.explMission: Get bonus points for using words containing specific letters.
kkutu.explStrict: Only standard nouns allowed (No dialects, old words, etc).
kkutu.explUnknown: Only words NOT in the dictionary are allowed.
kkutu.explOne: Game over immediately if you fail to type a word.
kkutu.explSurvival: Survival mode where you lose if your score runs out.
kkutu.explReturn: Used words can be used again if they haven't been used in the last 5 turns (no points).
kkutu.explMiddle: Chain with the middle letter. For even length, use the second of the middle two.
kkutu.explSecond: Chain with the second to last letter.
kkutu.explVowel: Quiz with vowels instead of consonants.
kkutu.explUnlimited: Words of any length can appear.
kkutu.explFreeDueum: Applies initial sound rule freely regardless of vowels.
kkutu.explSpeed: Turn time is reduced to half.
kkutu.explInjPick: Select topics to use in the game.
kkutu.kickVoteNotice: No response within time limit counts as Yes.
kkutu.guestExit:
Did you enjoy spectating?
Log in now to play!
kkutu.confirmNickChangeLimit: Change nickname/bio? Nickname cannot be changed again for {V1} days.
kkutu.confirmNickPolicy: Contains restricted characters/words. Remove them and change?
kkutu.cfTray: Click pieces to make a word.
kkutu.cfBlend: You can fuse 3 meaningless pieces. Click Compose to fuse.
kkutu.cmd_r: (/r) Press Ready. If Host, press Start.
kkutu.cmd_shut: (/shut target) Block all chat from target. Toggle.
kkutu.friendEditMemo: Set memo for this friend. (Max 50 chars)
kkutu.friendAddNotice:
Enter the ID number of the user to add.
Use /id command to find ID numbers.
kkutu.friendSureRemove: Delete this friend? You will also be removed from their list.
kkutu.dying: Connection will be terminated in 10s due to channel issues. Sorry for the inconvenience.
kkutu.blocked: Feature temporarily unavailable due to excessive messaging.
kkutu.paybackHelp: Hold Ctrl and click items to sell.
kkutu.surePayback:
Sell this item? Sold items cannot be recovered.
Expected Ping refund:
kkutu.alreadyGot: You already own this item.
kkutu.purchased: Purchase successful. Check [My Info] > [Edit Profile] to equip.
kkutu.okgExpl:
For every 10 minutes of gameplay with others,
you get a that increases XP and Ping gain!
kkutu.okgNotice: You played for 10 minutes and received a Buff!
kkutu.wpDesc2: You get XP reward if added!
kkutu.room_will_be_deleted_1m: Room will be deleted in 1 minute. Please start the game now!
kkutu.roomDestroyed: Room was deleted due to inactivity for 5 minutes.
kkutu.security_bot_check_fail: reCAPTCHA failed. Please try again on the main screen.
kkutu.birthdate_invalid_game_block: Game access restricted due to invalid birthdate. Please try again later.

game/fates.title: Card Match
game/fates.fcRule1: Press W to match target card and color in time! One chance only!
